text:
Suggested Reading
Radioscript in The Jeffersonian Heritage, Ch. Ill
Comments of Jefferson on the French Revolution:
In his Autobiography, Koch & Peden, pp. 104-106
To Lafayette, Feb. 14, 1815; Koch & Peden, pp. 654-655
To Barbe1 de Marbois, June 14, 1817; Koch & Peden, pp. 681-682
For further reading
On Jefferson's attitude toward the American Revolution:
Jefferson the Virginian, pp. 225-228, 242-243, and elsewhere
On Communism:
Hugh Seton-Watson, The East European Revolution (F.A. Praeger, 1951)
Hugh Seton-Watson, From Lenin to Malenkov (F.A. Praeger, 1953)
R. N. Carew Hunt, Theory and Practice of Communism (Macmillan, 1951)
Also
D. W. Brogan, The Price of Revolution (Harper, 1951)
60
